definition: The term "verblassend" refers to something that gradually loses its intensity, brightness, or significance over time. It is commonly used to describe the fading or diminishing of colors, emotions, memories, or any other visual or abstract elements.

examples.german: Die Farben verblassen mit der Zeit.
Die Bedeutung des Liedes verblassend im Laufe der Jahre.
examples.english: The meaning of the song fading over the years.

examples.german: Die Sonne verblassend hinter den Bergen.
examples.english: The sun fading behind the mountains.
